text: According to the Biblical narrative, Zerubbabel () was a governor of the Achaemenid Empire's province of Yehud Medinata and the grandson of , penultimate . == Pictures == == Notes == == References == == Other websites == * Easton's Bible Dictionary: Zerubbabel * Jewish Encyclopedia: Zerubbabel * GOTHOD- Zerubbabel Hebrew University of Jerusalem |- |- |- |- Category:Articles containing Akkadian-language text Category:Articles containing Latin-language text Category:Articles containing Hebrew-language text Category:Achaemenid Empire Category:Jewish history
title: Zerubbabel
